author: yoavs
msg: Added FAQ question and answer on log4j usage within JSP pages.

author: ceki
msg: o.a.l.html.HTMLLayout is a modified version of EnhancedHTMLLayout contributed by Steve Mactaggart. It formats its output
columns according to a conversion pattern, using the same syntax as PatternLayout. Each table row and cell can have its
own CSS class, adding great flexibility to the output format.

author: sdeboy
msg: - receivershelper now printing a warning when class not found - no stack trace printed
- improved matching of fields in logfilepatternreceiver:
avoiding greedy matches on all fields except the MESSAGE field
corrected a bug in exception/multi-line message building
